dmca.title: Abuse Report Please Act!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Sunday, March 04, 2007 10:12 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3323590R] Fw: Abuse Report Please Act! ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Fw: Abuse Report Please Act! Added by system at Sunday, Mar 4 2007 03:21 pm X-MailFrom: v.chaychi@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Mar 4 15:20:56 2007 Received: (qmail 13917 invoked by alias); 4 Mar 2007 21:20:56 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 13914 invoked from network); 4 Mar 2007 21:20:56 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 4 Mar 2007 21:20:56 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 4 Mar 2007 15:20:55 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sun, 04 Mar 2007 15:20:56 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from v.chaychi@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HNy8V-0007KZ-RL for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 04 Mar 2007 15:20:55 -0600 Received: from smtp103.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com ([206.190.36.81]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from v.chaychi@gmail.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HNy8Q-000K2N-Pb for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 04 Mar 2007 15:20:50 -0600 Received: (qmail 86662 invoked from network); 4 Mar 2007 21:20:48 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO mah) (vahid@rogers.com@74.112.51.211 with login) by smtp103.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com with SMTP; 4 Mar 2007 21:20:48 -0000 X-YMail-OSG: yf82GegVM1nba.PwcTbY.8ZBwYQVZZUupjaZ5rzeemk79lgoTF67hEWXJyGAOg2BWA-- Message-ID: <01a201c75ebc$1f511aa0$6400a8c0@mah> Reply-To: "Vahid Chaychi" From: "Vahid Chaychi" To: Cc: Subject: Fw: Abuse Report Please Act! Date: Sun, 4 Mar 2007 16:20:44 -0800 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_019F_01C75E79.0F1310F0" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180 Received-SPF: neutral (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 206.190.36.81 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of gmail.com) client-ip=206.190.36.81; envelope-from=v.chaychi@gmail.com; helo=smtp103.rog.mail.re2.yahoo.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 Mar 2007 21:20:56.0084 (UTC) FILETIME=[FF183D40:01C75EA2] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hi, I sent a warning to you about one of your clients who steals other websites contents (including my website). I have not received any reply from you. It seems you don't care about your clients activities and this can make problems for your company too. Hereby I warn you again. Next time I will ask my attorney to act and also will report you to the officials. ----- Original Message ----- From: Vahid Chaychi To: abuse@theplanet.com Cc: admins@theplanet.com ; abuse@PublicDomainRegistry.com Sent: Friday, March 02, 2007 9:30 AM Subject: Abuse Report Please Act! Hello, The below website, hosted/registered by you, has stolen my website content: http://sulaimaneffendi.com For example the content of the below page: http://sulaimaneffendi.com/?p=63 is stolen from one of my website pages at http://www.weboma.com/how-to-close-the-websitesweblogs-that-steal-your-w ebsite-content/ Please act and stop this website and let me know as soon as possible. I will be waiting for one day and then will call my attorney. Regards, Vahid MIME element (text/html)
Hi,
 
I sent a warning to you about one of your clients who steals other websites contents (including my website). I have not received any reply from you. It seems you don't care about your clients activities and this can make problems for your company too. Hereby I warn you again. Next time I will ask my attorney to act and also will report you to the officials.
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Vahid Chaychi
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: admins@theplanet.com ; abuse@PublicDomainRegistry. com
Sent: Friday, March 02, 2007 9:30 AM
Subject: Abuse Report Please Act!

Hello,
 
The below website, hosted/registered by you, has stolen my website content:
http://sulaimaneffendi.com< /DIV>
 
For example the content of the below page:
http://sulaimaneffendi.com/?p=63
 
is stolen from one of my website pages at
http://www.weboma.com/how-to-close-the-websiteswe blogs-that-steal-your-website-content/
 
Please act and stop this website and let me know as soon as possible. I will be waiting for one day and then will call my attorney.
 
Regards,
Vahid
MIME element (text/plain)
